description.short: Full-Stack CRUD app to find your favorite recipes

long.why: Cookbook is a full stack MERN application that allows users to search for recipes and perform CRUD operations on the saved recipes.Users can also create their own recipe cards.

description.short: activity suggetion app using the bored api

long.why: I wanted to build a multi-stage form that takes in a bunch of user information interacts with an API and sends meaningful content back. This project provided hands on experiecne with state managment, asynconous functions and handling different types of user input.
